alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northeastern Queen Anne`s and northeastern Kent Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Newtown to near Church Hill. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Chestertown, Church Hill, Millington, Sudlersville, Betterton, Saint Georges, Sassafras, Mount Pleasant, Glasgow, Port Penn, Morgnec, Delaney Corner, Massey, Crumpton, Kennedyville, Townsend, Galena, Odessa and Barclay. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 0 and 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for central and northern Delaware...and northeastern Maryland.
